utils

Utility file

This file implements functionalities used by other modules and accessible to the user

Functions

Get a subset of a dictionary.

is_allnan(data)

Check if all elements in the data are NaN.

is_colwise_numerical(df)

Check if each column in a DataFrame is numerical.

Check if a DataFrame contains only numerical data.
